## Helper.checkBoundary() function

Check if number is within safe integer boundary

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function checkBoundary(num: number): void;
```

## Exceptions

{<!-- -->RangeError<!-- -->} If number exceeds safe integer range

## Example
